subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala scored 14 of his 19 points in the second half, Kyle Korver had 11 points in the fourth quarter and the visiting Philadelphia 76ers rallied from a 19-point deficit.
snippet: Andre Iguodala scored 14 of his 19 points in the second half, Kyle Korver had 11 points in the fourth quarter and the visiting Philadelphia 76ers rallied from a 19-point deficit.
